item.title: Microsoft Build 2019 - Thoughts
item.description: Last week I attended my fifth Build (in a row! ðŸ¤¯). The conference and the company behind it has undergone a lot of change since 2015 when I first went, and I wanted to jot down my thoughts on the stuff I learned and the direction I think Microsoft is heading.

item.title: Hello, World (Or Yet Another .NET Dev Blog)
item.description: My name is Ryan, and I’m doing the cool thing and starting a blog. Here’s who I am.
